topic.title: Alternative authoring formats
topic.shortdesc: As of release 3.0, DITA-OT supports several alternative input formats in addition to standard DITA XML, including Markdown and the proposed MDITA and HDITA authoring formats currently in development for Lightweight DITA.

desc.ph: The User Guide is designed to provide basic information about using the DITA-OT. It is geared for an audience that needs information about running the toolkit, generating output, and troubleshooting builds.

link.desc: Markdown is a lightweight markup language that allows you to write using an easy-to-read plain text format and convert to structurally valid markup as necessary.

DITA-OT provides preview support for the MDITA and HDITA authoring formats proposed for Lightweight DITA, or “LwDITA”. These proposed formats are alternative representations of DITA content in Markdown or HTML.
Markdown DITA uses CommonMark as the underlying markup language.
